briefTitle: Chronic Pain and Minor Breast Cancer Surgery
officialTitle: Prospective Cohort Study Assessing Chronic Pain in Patients With Thoracic Blocks Following Minor Surgery for Breast Cancer.
conditions: Surgery, Breast Cancer, Pain, Postoperative, Pain, Chronic
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women
* \> 18 years old
* with "American Society of Anesthesiologists-ASA" physical status 1 to 3
* with unilateral breast cancer adenocarcinoma treated surgically by conservative tumorectomy associated or not to sentinel lymph node dissection on an ambulatory basis

Exclusion Criteria:

* None
